hints.content:
![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/527d559a9e601e4cc705e74c0331e07e6302dad0)

Carlos takes $\pink{3\text{ less}}$ minutes than Raj.
Raj takes $\pink{3\text{ more}}$ minutes than Carlos.

We can take the $\blue{4\text{ minutes}}$ Carlos reads and add an extra $\pink{3 \text{ minutes}}$ to get the time Raj reads.

$\blue{4} + \pink{3} = \purple{7}$
It takes Raj $\purple{7}$ minutes to read a chapter.

question.content:
Raj and Carlos are reading.  Carlos reads a chapter in $4$ minutes, which is $3$ minutes less time than it takes Raj.

**How long does it take Raj to read a chapter?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] minutes
